description: Build script for copying and preparing web project files, including copying source files, updating import paths, and generating the distribution directory.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Asynchronously copies a file from source to destination, creating necessary directories.

methods.name: copyFilesToMove
methods.description: Copies multiple files defined in an array to the target directory.

methods.name: updateImports
methods.description: Reads a file, replaces import path strings, and writes back the updated content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Main async function that orchestrates cleaning, copying, and updating project files for build process.
